name: TKTokenSmartCardPINAuthOperation
desc: A Smart Card PIN authentication operation.

items.name: var apduTemplate: Data?
items.desc: The template into which the PIN is filled in. nil by default.

items.name: var pinByteOffset: Int
items.desc: The offset, in bytes, within the APDU template to mark the location for filling in the PIN.

items.name: var smartCard: TKSmartCard?
items.desc: A Smart Card to which the formatted APDU is sent in order to authenticate.

items.name: var pin: String?
items.desc: The PIN value resulting from performing the operation.
